title: 點解外國啲政治人物高班咁多

replies.msg:
趙生，美國駐澳洲大領事做「炸兩」呀！

關於尋日外交部趙生個Tweet，搞到澳洲總理著晒火，今日輪到美國駐澳洲領事Arthur B. Culvahouse出聲喇，不過佢就無火氣嘅，只係玩篤盲腸。

"As we know from leaked reports published this week, the PRC government has yet to come clean on the origins of the COVID-19 virus, which is daily killing thousands of people worldwide. Yet its Foreign Affairs spokesperson thinks it appropriate diplomacy to spread disinformation through fabricated images and disingenuous statements. "

（呢個禮拜睇見嗰份洩漏嘅文件（關於湖北武漢上年年尾到今年年初隱瞞疫情），對於殺死全世界無數人嘅病毒來源，中國都好似水洗都未清喎。依家就外交部反而覺得自己用改圖發放假訊息係無問題？）

"Australia responsibly investigated and disclosed allegations that its soldiers committed crimes in Afghanistan. The PRC would do well to follow Australia’s example and disclose to the world all it knows about the origin of the COVID-19 virus."

（對於軍隊响阿富汗被指犯戰爭罪行，人地澳洲好負責任咁調查同公開資料嘅，中國要好好咁向澳洲學習下喎，話比全世界知隻病毒响邊度黎。）

"And the world can only wish that the Chinese Communist Party were to bring the same degree of transparency and accountability to credible reports of atrocities against the Uighurs in Xinjiang."

（另外，關於對維吾爾族嘅暴行，全世界都好想見到一份同樣咁公開可信嘅報告囉。）

#哎呀
#其實咪一早講咗囉
#病毒响意大利印度或者歐洲黎嘅
#總之唔係我
#完全無暴行
#剩係再教育

報導：
《The Sydney Herald》
US ambassador says China spreading 'fabricated images and disingenuous statements'
https://www.smh.com.au/politics/federal/us-ambassador-says-china-spreading-fabricated-images-and-disingenuous-statements-20201202-p56jw7.html
唔知點解見到堆hashtag 就覺得好尷尬
